Text.Section:
Warnings
For external use only
Do not use
* if you are allergic to any ingredient in this product When using this product
* apply only to affected areas * do not use in or near the eyes * avoid applying directly inside your mouth * do not share this product with anyone. This may spread infection. Stop use and ask a doctor if
* your cold sore gets worse or the cold sore is not healed within 10 days Keep out of reach of children.
If swallowed, get medical help or contact a poison control center right away.
